body_text:
I remembered I had this branch lying around from a few weeks ago and hadn't submitted it as a PR yet, whoops!
This PR depends on #300, since it seemed silly to merge documentation for the old show-heartbeat with a PR pending that changes its arguments. It shouldn't be merged until then, but the new commit is review-able in the meantime.
r?

title: Document actions
body:
I remembered I had this branch lying around from a few weeks ago and hadn't submitted it as a PR yet, whoops!

This PR depends on #300, since it seemed silly to merge documentation for the old show-heartbeat with a PR pending that changes its arguments. It shouldn't be merged until then, but the new commit is review-able in the meantime.
